author: Mehera Bonner
title: Who Is Paris Hilton Dating? - Paris Hilton's New Boyfriend Chris Zylka
text: By Mehera Bonner Feb 21, 2017 Paris Hilton has a new boyfriend, and he might look pretty familiar. Meet Chris Zylka, an actor best known for HBO's The Leftovers and The CW's canceled-too-soon witch drama The Secret Circle (anyone?). Paris and Chris (who used to date Lucy Hale) just went public on ye olde Instagram, and yes, they appear very much in love. A post shared by Paris Hilton (@parishilton) on Feb 19, 2017 at 5:04pm PST Advertisement - Continue Reading Below A post shared by Paris Hilton (@parishilton) on Feb 19, 2017 at 1:34pm PST Most Popular A post shared by Paris Hilton (@parishilton) on Feb 19, 2017 at 8:07pm PST It's unclear how long the pair have been dating, but they celebrated Paris' birthday togetherâ€”which she documented in the video below. A post shared by Paris Hilton (@parishilton) on Feb 19, 2017 at 6:09am PST Happy times.
